name.min: The {field} field cannot be shorter than {min} characters.
name.max: The {field} field cannot be longer than {max} characters.
name.upperLowerIncludingAccentedSpacesDotsHyp: The {field} field can only contain uppercase and lowercase letters (including accented characters), dot, spaces and hyphens.

email.min: The {field} field cannot be shorter than {min} characters.
email.max: The {field} field cannot be longer than {max} characters.

password.min: The {field} field cannot be shorter than {min} characters.
password.max: The {field} field cannot be longer than {max} characters.
password.mixed: The {field} field must contain at least one lowercase and one uppercase letter.
password.numbers: The {field} field must contain at least one number.
password.symbols: The {field} field must contain at least one special character.

password_confirmation.min: The {field} field cannot be shorter than {min} characters.
password_confirmation.max: The {field} field cannot be longer than {max} characters.
password_confirmation.mixed: The {field} field must contain at least one lowercase and one uppercase letter.
password_confirmation.numbers: The {field} field must contain at least one number.
password_confirmation.symbols: The {field} field must contain at least one special character.
password_confirmation.notMatch: The {mainField} field does not match confirmation.

length.min: The {field} field cannot be shorter than {min} characters.
length.max: The {field} field cannot be longer than {max} characters.

number.min: The {field} field cannot be less than {min}.
number.max: The {field} field cannot be grater than {max}.
